attributes.action: listen to the first petition regarding road pricing, and ensure it does not go ahead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After approximately 2,000,000 people petitioned against road pricing, it appears that it will still go ahead. Having not listened to a large proportion of British drivers, this is going against the opinions, given democratically, to the Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
